entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:55 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 08:01 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and drizzle changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
